channel.title: Pointless invisible wall in bm_c1a2a
channel.description: There's a spot in bm_c1a2a where an invisible wall prevents me from shooting a houndeye (see screenshot; includes position data). If I'm not supposed to kill it at that time, I'd suggest another solution because placing an obvious and confusing invisible wall at such a spot is always the worst solution (IMO). Making the houndeye appear there after reaching a certain area on the map might be a solution. ![bm_c1a2a0000.jpg|690x500](upload://iwqdEnwlMiMcBwVvmfteHIb93Vp.jpeg)

item.title: Pointless invisible wall in bm_c1a2a
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
This houndeye at that point in the level is meant as a bit of a gag (as it’s sitting there watching the TV). You do actually end up being able to kill it a bit later once you get to that next area.

Though I agree, there’s no real reason to not let you kill it there, other than the devs not wanting the player to be a heartless dick with interrupting its favorite show.
